channel.title: Starter armour problem plzzzzzz help

item.title: Starter armour problem plzzzzzz help
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Shutting the server down while it compiles does not help, it has to be compiled then restarted, or he is just using the saved character file before he changed the starter.

sufy:

o my bad i didnt restart server lol

Problem solved.

Read full topic

item.title: Starter armour problem plzzzzzz help
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

And you are sure that you compiled it correctly, and restarted the server?
Oh also I might know the problem, you logged in first with the old starter items and your character got saved, with the old ones. Try deleting your character or making a new one.

item.title: Starter armour problem plzzzzzz help
item.dc:creator: @sufy sufy
item.description:
@sufy wrote:

i changed my starter armour codes in player.java notepad file, i saved and compiled and the starter armour is still the same as before. i’m using hinatascape…this is what i changed it to

	//Giving the player an unique look
	playerEquipment[playerHat]=8303;
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=2414;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=12395;
	playerEquipment[playerShield]=6524;
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=12393;
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=10345;
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

Read full topic
